import React, { Component } from 'react'; class Courses extends Component { componentDidMount() { fetch('http://localhost:5000/api/courses') .then(res => res.json()) .then(res => this.setState({ courses: res })) .catch(error => console.log('Error fetching and parsing data', error) )}; state = { courses: '' } render() { return(
